snippet.title: Round robin scheduling - a survey
snippet.description:
* Round robin scheduling - a survey (Citations: 36)
Rasmus V. Rasmussen, Michael A. Trick
This paper presents a comprehensive survey on the literature considering round robin tour- naments. The terminology used within the area has been modifled over time and today it is highly inconsistent. By presenting a coherent explanation of the various notions we hope that this paper will help to obtain a unifled terminology. Furthermore, we outline the contributions presented during the ...
Journal: European Journal of Operational Research - EJOR , vol. 188, no. 3, pp. 617-636, 2008
